text: Connecticut Governor Dannel Malloy signs legislation that formally abolishes the death penalty in the northeastern US state.
A spokesman for Newt Gingrich says the former US House Speaker...
...will officially end his campaign for the Republican presidential nomination next week.
The US Agriculture Department confirms the nation's fourth case of mad cow disease in a dairy cow from central California.
More than 200 protesters and supporters gather in Washington, DC...
...as the US Supreme Court considers a tough Arizona law that requires police to check the immigration status of anyone they stop.
Promise Phan earns more than 100 million views on YouTube with her ability to make herself look like virtually anyone.
